name: Outer Atoll Trading Posts
economy_niches: Light craft shipbuilding and reef repair
Storage and resale of imported ritual reagents
culture_adjustments: Stronger Island Creole and Riveric loan-words in dockside argot
More fluid patronage: crews and seasonal captains dilute strict patriliny
Tide-based timekeeping adapted for reef-harvest cycles
Practical multilingual literacy concentrated in stevedores and augurs
Ancestor rites combine ship-offerings with quick-market memorials
constraints: Ritual reagents expensive and controlled by mainland guilds
No heavy or high-pressure industry on fragile atolls
notes: Key relay points for long-distance convoys and augury updates
Seasonal population flux â€” market booms during monsoon windows
Strategic choke points for state trade; lightly garrisoned
